title: mris_skeletonize
description: Computes the skeleton of gyri (ie, the crowns) or sulci (ie, the fundi).

surfvals.title: Surface Values Path
surfvals.description: Pass input explicitly rather than computing it.

curv_nonmaxsup.title: Curvature Non-Max Suppression Flag
curv_nonmaxsup.description: Use curvature H computed from surface with non-max suppression (not with --k1).

gyrus.title: Gyrus Flag
gyrus.description: Skeletonize the crowns of the gyri.

sulcus.title: Sulcus Flag
sulcus.description: Skeletonize the fundi of the sulci.

outdir.title: Output Directory
outdir.description: Directory where all outputs will be saved.

sphere.title: Sphere Path
sphere.description: Sphere path, only needed for nonmax suppression.

label.title: Label Path
label.description: Surface label of the skeleton (label file path).

threshold.title: Threshold Value
threshold.description: Used to create initial mask that will be skeletonized (typically about 0.3).

cluster.title: Cluster Size
cluster.description: Cluster the thresholded input and keep the largest nkeep clusters.

fwhm.title: FWHM Value
fwhm.description: Smooth surface values by this FWHM.
